entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 early this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
